data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Tara: Billy said that he would go to pick up the kids this afternoon.
Caleb: No, I ____ he ____ that ____ wanted ____ pick ____ kids ____, ____ couldn't.
Tara: In ____ case, somebody ____ will ____ to ____ it, because I'll still ____ at ____. Can ____ go?
Caleb: Sure, I can get them at 3 PM.
data.partBlankContent:
Tara: Billy said that he would go to pick up the kids this afternoon.
Caleb: No, I th___ he sa__ that h_ wanted t_ pick t__ kids u_, b__ couldn't.
Tara: In th__ case, somebody el__ will ha__ to d_ it, because I'll still b_ at wo__. Can y__ go?
Caleb: Sure, I can get them at 3 PM.
data.fullContent: Tara: Billy said that he would go to pick up the kids this afternoon. Caleb: No, I think he said that he wanted to pick the kids up, but couldn't. Tara: In this case, somebody else will have to do it, because I'll still be at work. Can you go? Caleb: Sure, I can get them at 3 PM.
data.answer: 塔拉：比利说他今天下午要去接孩子们。 凯莱布：不，我想他说过他想去接孩子，但是不行。 塔拉：在这种情况下，就得由别人来做，因为我还在上班。你能去吗? 凯莱布：当然可以，我下午3点可以去接他们。
